problem.description: Do not place Android context classes in static fields (static reference to AppGlobalState which has field currentActivity pointing to Activity); this is a memory leak
problem.highlighted_element: object AppGlobalState { var isLocked = true // Start as locked, LauncherActivity will decide ...

problem.description: <html>Do not place Android context classes in static fields; this is a memory leak</html>
problem.highlighted_element: var currentActivity: android.app.Activity? = null // Track current foreground activity, more generic...
